channel.title: RuneLord Beta - Cotinued
channel.description:
Base: Deltascape Previous Development: RuneLord Zombie Edition Done 100% sitting on chairs 100% Npc Dialogue - follow my tutorial! 100% FunPk Areas - follow my tutorial! 90% Delta glitch fixes 70% range following 70% npc clipping 95% player clipping 100% Undead Battle Fixed Syi, nulls, glitches, bugs and floods. Fixed dupe 100% Fixed xlog ( allows 1 connection ) 100% Fixed Dieng glitch at home area 100% Can hold over 100-150 players without lagging 40% Skills done: Agility Mining Smithing Smelting Fishing *not done* Construction *not yet* Domain Website: PM me for it Webclient Done 100% Sounds and Music system working 60% minigames and teleports Future updates: Casino, gambling place where you can gamble with players etc. Barrows fix. Others: Fixed cheat client no clipping Intorduction: This is RuneLord it was founded at 2010 when my friend was over and I had an idea, I teached him how to model and code items and places, I took java lessons online and made my through, I used my own methods and barley used tutorials. [b]Requested Spots: Moderator, 2 open Art Manager ( take care of client picture, ideas, chatbox etc.) Coder ( I'm only opening for the best and 1 spot only )[/b] If you are intrested in any of those spots: add me: xxlove2pkxx@hotmail.com RuneLord is a great game, its goal is for players to have fun and right now RuneLord needs beta testers! Staff: gravenfire23 - Art Manager zjbarden - html & Moderator Beta-testers: Rash Moderator Application form.
Age: Email Adress: PM me if you like. Past experience: Why you deserve this spot. Extra detail if you want to type here:
Beta test Application form.
Age: Email Adress: PM me if you like. Are you good with ideas? (yes/no) Extra detail if you want to type here:
Pictures: [img]http://i613.photobucket.com/albums/tt216/runescape_bucket/pic8-1.png[/img] [img]http://i613.photobucket.com/albums/tt216/runescape_bucket/Pic5-2.png[/img] [img]http://i613.photobucket.com/albums/tt216/runescape_bucket/pic14-1.png[/img] [img]http://i613.photobucket.com/albums/tt216/runescape_bucket/pic15-1.png[/img] [img]http://i613.photobucket.com/albums/tt216/runescape_bucket/pic6-2.png[/img] [img]http://i613.photobucket.com/albums/tt216/runescape_bucket/pic4-1.png[/img] [img]http://i613.photobucket.com/albums/tt216/runescape_bucket/Pic3-1.png[/img] [img]http://i613.photobucket.com/albums/tt216/runescape_bucket/pic1-2.png[/img] [img]http://i613.photobucket.com/albums/tt216/runescape_bucket/pic13.png[/img] [img]http://i613.photobucket.com/albums/tt216/runescape_bucket/pic2-2.png[/img] [img]http://i613.photobucket.com/albums/tt216/runescape_bucket/Pic11.png[/img] [img]http://i613.photobucket.com/albums/tt216/runescape_bucket/pic10-1.png[/img]

@Uncalled wrote:

[quote=“whattehp406, post:25, topic:376739”][quote author=noobs are ftw link=topic=472660.msg3491819#msg3491819 date=1296986037]
as soon as i saw Base: Deltascape

i knew its a I was a fail server
[/quote]fixed

delta can be good you n00b[/quote]Delta can be, give it a good 5-8 month project and you can turn it into a decent server.
Or just leech blakeman’s and Graham’s edited wL base.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneLord Beta - Cotinued
item.dc:creator: @xxxxxx_13 xxxxxx 13
item.description:
@xxxxxx_13 wrote:

answer me this.

What sets them above wL? Just the scripting. And how the creator went about setting up the server framework. Correct? So why can a person not rewrite the problems with the wL source. Thus making it an equivalent or near that of one of the “modernized” framework.

I promise you this. Only about 5% of players care about the base/stability/ etc. When it comes down to it. Gameplay is what decides the population.

Read full topic
